dct_title_s: War map: Japan and other strategic Pacific areas
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights. Map shows international and provincial boundaries, submarine tunnel under construction, approximate course of the Kuro Shio or Japanes stream, 2 types of roads, and 2 types of railroads, "1244"--In lower right margin of Japan map. "Copyright, General Drafting Co., Inc."
dct_publisher_sm: New York, N.Y. : General Drafting Co., [1944].
